name: PredicatedCollection_addTest
description: Unit tests for the add method of PredicatedCollection, focusing on valid and invalid element additions.

test_cases.name: testAddValidElement
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of a valid element to the PredicatedCollection.

test_cases.name: testAddInvalidElement
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of an invalid (null) element to the PredicatedCollection, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
